location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.424 of 1820 from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In the letter Warden acknowledges receipt of Bruce's dispatched dated 5 February 1820, adding that the Honourable Acting President in Council authorises the continued presence of the brokers at Katife [al-Qatif] until further notice.
